description: Popular in Eastern Europe, borscht is a colourful soup with beetroot as its main ingredient. Try this quick version for a vibrant, creamy and delicious result.
name: Borscht Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, celery, potato and garlic and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes. Add stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 minutes or until celery softens. Add beetroot.
Remove saucepan from heat. Using a stick blender, blend until smooth, then stir through cream. Add vinegar, celery salt and ground white pepper, then stir to combine.
Return pan to medium heat and bring to a simmer. Add cabbage and cook for 2 minutes or until softened. Ladle soup into bowls, swirl through sour cream and sprinkle over dill. Serve with bread.
